description.value:
Age. Goliaths have lifespans comparable to humans.

Creature Type. You are a Humanoid.

Size. Your size is Medium. Goliaths are between 7 and 8 feet tall and weigh between 280 and 340 pounds.

Speed. Your base Speed is 35 feet.

Giant Ancestry. You are descended from Giants. Choose one of the following benefits - a supernatural boon from your ancestry. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your Proficiency Bonus, regaining all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

Cloud's Jaunt (Cloud Giant). As a Bonus Action, you magically teleport up to a number of feet equal to five times your Proficiency Bonus to an unoccupied space you can see.

Coral's Edge (Coral Giant). When you deal Bludgeoning, Piercing or Slashing damage (including with spells) to a target, you can treat a roll of 1 or 2 as the maximum result on the die instead.

Fire's Burn (Fire Giant). When you deal damage to a target, you can deal 1d10 bonus Fire damage to the target.

Forest's Bark (Forest Giant). When you fail a saving throw, you can take a Reaction to roll a d4 and add it to the save, potentially turning the failure into a success.

Frost's Chill (Frost Giant). When you deal damage to a target, you can deal 1d6 bonus Cold damage to the target and reduce their Speed by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

Hill's Tumble (Hill Giant). When you deal damage to a target that is one size category larger or smaller than you, you can knock the target &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Stone's Endurance (Stone Giant). When you take damage, you can use take a Reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled and reduce the damage by that total.

Storm's Thunder (Storm Giant). When you take damage from a creature within 60 feet of you, you can take a Reaction to deal 1d8 Thunder damage to that creature.

Large Form. When you reach character level 5, you gain the ability to supernaturally grow. As a Bonus Action, you increase your size category by one, provided you are in a big enough space. This transformation lasts for 10 minutes or until you end it as a Bonus Action. During that duration, you have advantage on Strength checks, and your Speed increases by 10 feet. Once you use this trait, you cannot use it again until you finish a Long Rest.


Little Giant. You have proficiency in the Athletics skill, and you have Advantage on any ability check or saving throw to avoid or end the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] or &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition on yourself.

Powerful Build. You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.
